<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get the list of movies that are currently in theatres in a country.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"langauge","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","default":"en_US"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":1}},{"name":"region","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"NG"},"description":"ISO-3166-1 code"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
